name: Line with blue
description: Arrange the balls as shown in the picture and practice potting the red balls while pulling the blue balls. This exercise builds confidence in positioning to the blue ball.

name: Eight red with blue
description: Arrange the balls as shown in the picture and practice pocketing the red balls and good positioning cue ball to the blue ball. Positioning the cue ball to the blue ball requires concentration and focus.

name: Eight red with black
description: Place the black ball in its position and then the red ball according to the diagram. Pocket all the reds with the black ball. This exercise will help you build high breaks.

name: Eight red with pink
description: Put the pink ball in its place, then the red one as shown in the picture. Pocket all the reds with the pink ball. This exercise will help you to feel confident on the pink ball.

name: Cross with two on cushion
description: This exercise aims to build the highest possible break (minimum 100 point), for this you need to pocket two difficult red balls from the cushion.

name: Long red to black
description: Pocketing a difficult long red ball with exit to the black ball position. This scenario happens in almost every game.

name: Pink spot to middle pocket
description: Pocketing the pink ball into the middle pocket, the cue ball on the cushion. This exercise will build your confidence with these moves on the pink ball.

name: Seven red with baulk colors
description: Potting the red balls with a journey to the balls of low colors. This exercise requires good table feel and positioning of the cue ball over long distances.
